name: WorldCountries
0:
”Alexa, open world countries”
”Alexa, ask world countries, new country and its capital”
”Alexa, ask world countries, random country”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: world countries
des:
The world is composed by many different countries and surely there are some that you did not know or did not remember. Thanks to this skill you will be able to learn new countries of the world with their corresponding capitals.

Dare to try this new skill because it is never too late to continue learning.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
